mapper.sql: ID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_DESCRIPTION, CREATE_TIME, STATUS, ROLE_SORT, UPDATE_TIME, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from UMS_ROLE
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into UMS_ROLE
ID,
ROLE_NAME,
ROLE_DESCRIPTION,
CREATE_TIME,
STATUS,
ROLE_SORT,
UPDATE_TIME,
CREATED_BY,
UPDATED_BY,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{roleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{roleSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update UMS_ROLE
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ROLE_NAME = #{record.roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_DESCRIPTION = #{record.roleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ROLE_SORT = #{record.roleSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_BY = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_BY = #{record.updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update UMS_ROLE set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ROLE_NAME = #{record.roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_DESCRIPTION = #{record.roleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ROLE_SORT = #{record.roleSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_BY = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_BY = #{record.updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update UMS_ROLE
ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_DESCRIPTION = #{roleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ROLE_SORT = #{roleSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update UMS_ROLE set ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_DESCRIPTION = #{roleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ROLE_SORT = #{roleSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT distinct m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.MENU_LEVEL menuLevel, m.MENU_SORT menuSort, m.MENU_NAME menuName, m.menu_icon menuIcon, m.route_name routeName, m.CREATE_TIME createTime, m.UPDATE_TIME updateTime, m.CREATED_BY createdBy, m.UPDATED_BY updatedBy FROM ums_admin_role_relation arr LEFT JOIN ums_role r ON arr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN ums_role_menu_relation rmr ON r.id = rmr.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE arr.admin_id = #{adminId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL

SELECT distinct m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.MENU_LEVEL menuLevel, m.MENU_SORT menuSort, m.MENU_NAME menuName, m.menu_icon menuIcon, m.route_name routeName FROM ums_role_menu_relation rmr LEFT JOIN ums_menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE rmr.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL

SELECT distinct r.id id, r.create_time createTime, r.resource_name resourceName, r.resource_url resourceUrl, r.resource_description resourceDescription, r.category_id categoryId FROM ums_role_resource_relation rrr LEFT JOIN ums_resource r ON rrr.resource_id = r.id WHERE rrr.role_id = #{roleId} AND r.id IS NOT NULL AND r.id not in(214469071173869568,214469218180030464,214469407926149120)
